definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: Five others have multiple-choice written exams, but they are not very hard.
sentences.chinese: 其他五個州設置了多選題的筆試，但並不非常困難。

sentences.english: When asking learners to answer fill - in - the - blank or multiple-choice questions, be sure to provide directions.
sentences.chinese: 當要求學習者去回答填空或多選題時，確信提供說明。

sentences.english: Which two groups of patients receive free medicine?A. People over 17 years old.
sentences.chinese: 的一道多選題是關於能夠得到免費醫療的人羣的選擇。
